origin: Middle English of Germanic origin, related to Dutch droom and German Traum, and probably also to Old English drēam ‘joy, music’.

definitions.definition: A series of thoughts, images, and sensations occurring in a person's mind during sleep.
definitions.example: I had a recurrent dream about falling from great heights

definitions.definition: A cherished aspiration, ambition, or ideal.
definitions.example: I fulfilled a childhood dream when I became champion
I dreamed about her last night

definitions.definition: Indulge in daydreams or fantasies about something greatly desired.
definitions.example: she had dreamed of a trip to America

definitions.definition: Contemplate the possibility of doing something or that something might be the case.
definitions.example: I wouldn't dream of foisting myself on you
